column4: Why can't I recive packages from my desktop connected to my NAT router. The router has the configuration: echo > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward      iptables --append FORWARD --in-interface eth0 -j ACCEPT       and   iptables --table nat --append POSTROUTING --out-interface eth0 -j MASQUERADE. I have configured the network correct.
Any idea how to solve this?
